resources.string: Launch a new activity to get a quote

string-array.name: quote_array
string-array.item: Baseball is 90% mental and the other half is physical \n- Yogi Berra
Nobody goes there any more. It\'s too crowded.\n- Yogi Berra
Half the lies they tell about me aren\'t true.\n- Yogi Berra
It gets late early out there.\n- Yogi Berra
A nickle ain\'t worth a dime anymore.\n- Yogi Berra
